website_summaries.verdict: A breathable nursing cover that allows you to see baby while nursing.
pros: Features stainless-steel D-rings for an adjustable neckline and a rigid neckline to see baby while nursing
Can also be used as a blanket or seat cover
cons: Not ideal for outdoor use in colder temperatures

customer_reviews.title: Gives lots of coverage!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this cover! I’m a new mom and still struggle with being comfortable breastfeeding in public. I have one by hoppy that is too small and I don’t really feel covered. This one is nice and wide and really covers you. I feel confident I’m getting my privacy while doing what’s necessary and feeding my baby while we are out. Definitely reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Yon

customer_reviews.title: I wish it didn’t have the string around the back.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it didn’t have the string around the back. They at least should’ve made it optional (something you tie or can remove). I cut mine out. Otherwise I love it, especially the “crease” a few reviews complained about. I hate nursing covers that just lay across the baby’s face, so this one actually “tents” out a bit and gives room to breathe, all while giving you full-coverage privacy!
customer_reviews.author: Jae.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I bought 2 different covers for my daughter and this has been her favorite to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi5

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this nursing cover!! Its at an affordable price and the quality of the fabric is perfect for babies to breathe. Also i like the length of the cover is really long and wide covering almost your back.
customer_reviews.author: ana rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good idea for breast feeding moms
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy. I Just had my baby and I am exclusively breast feeding. Instead of packing bottles, water, formula and all that extra stuff, I pack this. Its compact like a mini umbrella. So when baby is hungry I just throw it over my neck and him any where for privacy and feed. Some people may just think it's apart of your clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kenesha Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awful, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This nursing cover is awful. 1. It is not what is pictured. In the picture there is a cute ruffle at the bottom on the cover which is inaccurate. It is just a hem. 2. At the top of the nursing cover is a wire, which most nursing covers have these days so you can see your baby and for oxygen. The wire should be round. Mine came bent in the middle so the wire pops out to a V at the top of the cover. 3. I’ve only used this cover twice. I washed it once before using and the wire is poking out of the fabric at the top of the cover. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Eyer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! The price is just right. I got a more expensive one with my last baby and it was just awful, it was bulky and just didn’t work for me. While this one is cheaper then others don’t let that fool you, give this one a try I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Back cord gets in way
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't really like the string in the back. I understand why they put it there so you aren't free showing everyone your boob while nursing. However that cord just gets in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just use a blanket
customer_reviews.text: I had something like this with an older child during nursing but after arriving I realized that what I used to have was much better quality. This thing is very large and not versatile. It has an extra string that I guess you can use to tighten but when you have a hungry baby moving about looking for your breast that’s the last thing you’re attempting to use. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita W.

customer_reviews.title: Full Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Provides full coverage. Lightweight and I can see baby looking down as there is a stiffness at the top that provides a bit of a peep hole. Folds small for easy packing. Like everything about this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Like this so far. My first baby would not nurse under a cover but now having a toddler we will be out more. Love how I can see baby and he can see me because the edge “tents” out- also keeps it off his face. Can easily put this on with one hand and I feel covered. I don’t think I’ll need the Extra string in the back but can easily be cut off if I decide to. Love the little compact bag to carry it in the diaper bag and keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: co

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I chose to cut off the little white string and now I love it and find out very easy to use. I love that I can easily look down the top.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite cover up. It is large and has the wire so you can see the baby. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: A nursing must have!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than trying to cover myself with a blanket. Breathable and folds up small into the diaper bag. The open neck line giving me vision of my son is super genius.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Baby is invisible to others but cozy with Mom
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I bought it for my daughter and she said it makes it easy to nurse anywhere she goes. Soft and lightweight material with a built in soft bend to see baby while nursing.
customer_reviews.author: StarLight

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter - new mom of twins! It came promptly and was just as described. It is lightweight and comes with a carrying case too. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Stiff
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a big fan. The fabric was very stiff (almost like an apron) BUT it folded down so compact and was very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Soft and lightweight. I love the little carrying case that came with it! My baby isn't due for a couple weeks but I'm sure this will work great for us!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi G

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for thinking ahead!
customer_reviews.text: This is for a friend but it came in an eco friendly bag and seems like it will be useful.
customer_reviews.author: Paperflower

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover I use it to cover me while I am pumping and driving. It's very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: HanifaH

customer_reviews.title: overall, it is a good product
customer_reviews.text: I have a four month old breastfeeding baby. This is so convenient and good on him! I brought him to zoo last weekend. It is so useful! I can see him from the top and it covers well! Easy to carry! Recommend to breastfeeding mommys!
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits great in our diaper bag and is perfect for every occasion I’ve needed to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Graves

customer_reviews.title: It does it's job but...
customer_reviews.text: It is not breathable. My baby and I gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: It works better than any cover I've tried. There is a small strap that I think is supposed to go around your back. Dont remove this, just work around it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Roomy and breathable for baby when being breastfeed. Easy to use. Love the gender neutral color & print. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it, very lightweight yet covers nicely
customer_reviews.author: Sissie King

customer_reviews.title: Good cover
customer_reviews.text: I like that i can see my son while breast feeding. And noone else can.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Good nursing cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my granddaughter. The baby wasn’t hot and my granddaughter could keep an eye on the baby. This she knew the baby was ok. And it kept my granddaughter covered not exposing herself.Hoo
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has multiple use for it and it’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It works great as a pumping cover but when I tried to use it for nursing the top part collapses and I cant see my baby..
customer_reviews.author: Chea King

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover, it’s easy to use, store and carry around with me. It’s lightweight for the summer but still has full coverage
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Provides great coverage
customer_reviews.text: This has great coverage while still allowing baby to move and breath. Easy to fold up and put back in the little carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Cole

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love the nursing cover, is easy to use and I love the fabric!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will fit in any size diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: It was a great add on gift for a baby shower
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for summer
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to carry, lightweight and breathable, very useful in summer.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Munro

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Has a very bad smell to the product, smells like petrol/gas.
customer_reviews.author: vamshi

customer_reviews.title: Expecting in December can’t wait to use it
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with I’ll be able to use in December but love the quality of the item
customer_reviews.author: Crystal arndt

product_meta.title: Wsky Nursing Cover - Baby Best Breastfeeding - Infant Feeding Cover - Full Coverage, 100% Breathable Soft Cotton, Stylish and Elegant
product_meta.description:
It Is Amazing Product Keeping Away From Embarrassmeet Perfect for Both Mom and Baby,especially for the New Mom.

Wsky nursing cover is made from natural cotton, soft, stretchy, breathable material and equipped with some considerate design to meet the needs of multi-use occasions. Besides, this multi-use nursing cover is a thoughtful gift for both mom and baby.


Safety Information

To ensure safety, do not leave infant unattended while covered. As this may lead to suffocation or strangulation.


Design Details

❤ Material: Made of special cotton fabrics, breathable and not stuffy, available in all the seasons. Besides, environmental printing add mysterious charms to the nursing cover.
❤ Perfect Privacy Protection: 24.4 * 32.2 inches size allows you to feed without embarrassment in public places such as Cafes, Restaurants and Shopping Malls.
❤ The Neckline: Made with a flexible bow that allows mothers to see their little one while breastfeeding. Besides, mothers enjoy the perfect coverage that will maintain their modesty and will give their little one a safe, comfortable place to nurse peacefully.
❤ Tpye-D Ring Design: It could be shortened and lengthened to accommodate any mother's needs.This allows mom and their little one to have a eye contact or something else according to their willing.
❤ Anti-lifting Belt: It prevents baby’s lifting to ensure the privacy of mom and lovely baby.


Amazing Using Ways of the Wsky Nursing Cover

❤ Nursing Cover
❤ Breastfeeding Cover
❤ Nursing Scarf
❤ Car Seat Canopy
❤ Shopping Cart Cover
❤ Stroller Cover
❤ Nursing Poncho
❤ Changing Diapers
feature_bullets: PERFECT COVERAGE PRIVACY & KEEP YOUR BABY HEALTHY: A perfect coverage of 24.4 * 32.2 inches size helps moms be comfortable breastfeeding or pumping wherever and whenever. It also keeps your baby sleeping sweetly protecting them away from sunlight, wind, bacteria and bugs.
EASY TO USE & SWEET EYE CONTACT: Easy to put on and adjust closed loop to see your baby anytime you want. Moreover, the cotton cloth is machine washable for easy care.

SKIN-FIRENDLY & BREATHABLE COTTON: Made of 100% organic cotton, soft, safe, and lightweight, which creates the most comfortable and private environment for close care and love interaction , and protect your baby’s tender skin.

A COSY GIFT & MUTI-FUNCTION: Prefect presents and sincere mind for any moms , especially for new moms. Meanwhile our nursing cover is not only for breastfeeding, but also a scarf or blanket to keep your baby warm and a seat or carrier cover to keep your baby comfortable.

EXCEPTIONAL VALUES: In Wsky, we truly care about your purchasing experience. All our products are only sold in “Wsky” store, and Fulfilled by Amazon. We offer considerate afer-sale service if not completely satisfied with this nursing cover.
